translation: Having obtained it, he thinks there is no other gain superior to it; established in it, he is not moved even by heavy sorrow.
commentary: 6.22 Yam which? labdhva having obtained? f and? Another other? Labham gain? Thinks thinks? Not not? More greater? Then than that? in which in which? established established? Not not? Dukhen by sorrow? Guruna (by) heavy? Even even? Vichalyate is moved.Commentary Which the gain or the realization of the Self or the immortal Soul.Wherein in the allblissful Self which is free from delusion and sorrow. The Self is allfull
